description:
The ultimate pedal for enduro riding and racing. The concave platform with 6 pins per side ensure a secure foothold. Traction pads let you customize the fit an feel. And with a Q-factor of 52mm, you know you'll have the maneuvrability you need on tight trails.

  • Chamfered edges to reduce rock-strikes
  • Body is 6061-T6 aluminum, concave and ribbed for traction when unclipped
  • Wing and spring are stainless steel
  • Spindle is 435 chromoly
  • Double-lip internal seal and external seal keep out water and debris to extend pedal life
  • Inner glide bearings perform in adverse conditions
  • Enduro cartridge bearing has great corrosion resistance and superior tolerance
  • Includes premium brass cleats with shims
  • 6 adjustable pins per side for grip
  • Hex alloy endcap
  • Release angle is 15 or 20 degrees
  • Polyurethane traction pad lets you customize the shoe/pedal interface
name: Crankbrothers Mallet Enduro Pedals
